config_bot_agent_username_desc: After creating the Bot User and add it to your BOT department, add its username here
config_bot_replies_desc: The JSON which is used for customizing bot responses. You can use [this tool](https://jsoneditoronline.org/#left=cloud.60d1a19acf194ff8bb46bf1ba4002ca7) to edit and verify the bot responses.
config_dst_enabled_desc: Daylight Saving Time (DST) is a system where clocks are adjusted forward by one hour during warmer months to extend evening daylight.
config_department_offline_text_desc: The message that will be sent to the user if the department is offline
